info.title: Apptigent PowerTools PRO
info.description: Apptigent PowerTools PRO is the ultimate toolkit for Power Platform professionals. Manipulate text, modify collections, format dates and times, convert currency, perform advanced mathematical calculations, shorten URLâ€™s, encode and decode strings, convert text to speech, translate content into multiple languages, and more. PowerTools PRO includes everything from the LITE version plus over 25 advanced actions to take your apps, forms and flows to the next level.

trim.description: Trim white space from comparison string

type.description: Type of number - integer or decimal

item.description: Item (for multiple items, leave blank and use Items)

items.description: Items (Collection, for a single item leave blank and use Item)

index.description: Index position for operation (leave blank to specify end of collection)

match.description: String to match (explicit, case-insensitive, leave empty to use Index)

index.description: Index location to split (leave empty to use Match value)
